... Into the jaws of Death,
Into the mouth of hell
Rode the six hundred.

No. 22
Description: My own personal take on the historical Sherman Firefly 6.0x optic and the vanilla Ariete MBT sight found in game.

Bonus Drawing: Album cover of The Trooper and band logo by English heavy metal band Iron Maiden, 1983. requested by @typicalpilot2311. (You'll take my life, but I'll take yours too!!)

Best Used: Universally; the MBT Ariete sight best for high-top tier tanks and the UK universal sight ...
